event.title: pass through Saavedra en route to their weekends

data.event: Many inhabitants of Buenos Aires pass through Saavedra en route to their weekends in the country.

event.title: the late 1970s tenure of military-appointed Mayor Osvaldo Cacciatore, who planned

data.event: Points south were the site of extensive demolition during the late 1970s tenure of military-appointed Mayor Osvaldo Cacciatore, who planned a network of new expressways including one through Saavedra, one of the city's most residential barrios.
